1. [Home](https://www.huttotx.gov/)
2. Government

Government
==========

9

1

1

2

1. #### [Agendas & Minutes](https://www.huttotx.gov/129)

   View current agendas and minutes for all boards and commissions
2. #### [Boards & Commissions](https://www.huttotx.gov/416/Boards-Commissions)

   Discover the boards and commissions that drive your local government. Find agendas, member information, and other meeting details.
3. #### [City Council](https://www.huttotx.gov/433/City-Council)

   The Hutto City Council is composed of the Mayor and 6 other Council members. The Mayor and all Council members are elected from the City at large and each Council member occupies a position on the City Council.
4. #### [City Fee Schedule](https://www.huttotx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/5396/2024_11_21-Fee-Schedule)

   Read the current city fee schedule, adopted 11/21/24.
5. #### [City Manager's Office](https://www.huttotx.gov/442/City-Managers-Office)

   The City Manager's Office supervises the City of Hutto and its employees.
6. #### [City Secretary](https://www.huttotx.gov/450/City-Secretary)

   The City Secretary is primarily responsible for all aspects of municipal records.
7. #### [Departments](https://www.huttotx.gov/157/Departments)

   The mission of the Development Services Department is to develop a healthy, vibrant city through thoughtful implementation of the Comprehensive Plan, Unified Development Code, and other adopted development policies. The Department is committed to providing superior customer service with an emphasis on creating a City with a strong economic base and a wide range of diversified housing opportunities while still promoting an attractive small-town atmosphere.
8. #### [Governmental Transparency](https://www.huttotx.gov/772/Governmental-Transparency)

   Financial, economic development, economic incentives, and litigation transparency for the City.
9. #### [Local Government Corporations](https://www.huttotx.gov/457/Local-Government-Corporations)

   Discover the local government corporations operating within Hutto.
10. #### [Records Library](https://www.huttotx.gov/archive.aspx)

    Search the archive of ordinances and resolutions. Choose the drop down menus to view documents. Select the All Archive Items in the drop down or use the search feature to access older documents.
11. #### [Strategic Planning](https://www.huttotx.gov/461/Strategic-Planning)

    Review the City of Hutto's strategic plan: a vision statement, key mission elements, core values, and strategic pillars to house objectives.

* [Meeting Videos & Agendas](https://www.huttotx.gov/586)

* [Utility Payments](https://huttotx.watersmart.com/index.php/welcome)

* [Job Opportunities](https://www.governmentjobs.com/careers/huttotx/)

* [Public Notices](https://www.huttotx.gov/585/Public-Hearings-Notices)

* [Report a Concern](https://www.huttotx.gov/804/Solve-It804/Solve-It)

* [Development & Construction](https://www.huttotx.gov/301/Development-Services)
